sentences: Neon Hitch (born 25 May 1986) is an English singer and songwriter.
Neon's debut album, Anarchy, was released on 22 July 2016 via WeRNeon.
At the age of sixteen, Hitch moved to India for a few years before resettling in London to start her music career.
